item.title: Best Chrome Extensions for Web Development
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Google Chrome and its developer tools are an absolute necessity for any web developer. But you shouldn’t stop there because there are even more great tools and extensions that will help you with web development and design. So let’s take a look at some of the best ChromeÂ extensions for web development. React Developer Tools If you plan on doing development in React, then you should definitely download this extension.
